Summary Note:
Hortense Anaïs Simons and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Brussels. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Hortense Anaïs Simons is a 59 year old Creative Director from Belgium.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Hortense Anaïs Simons and Sanders have been married since 1997. Together they have 1 kid called Charlotte.
Education Background:
In 1983, Hortense finished her secondary school education at Collège Notre-Dame de la Consolation.
Hortense completed her university education at Vrije Universiteit Brussel in 1989.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 36 years, Hortense Anaïs Simons has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Hortense Anaïs Simons's first role was as a Assistant Designer at Ann Demeulemeester BVBA, where she worked diligently from 1989 to 1993 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1993, she moved to Stella McCartney Belgium to work as a Senior Designer, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
In 1996, she joined Walter Van Beirendonck BVBA as a Creative Director, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 1340000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3840000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, she received an inheritance of 750000 EUR in 2007, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Hortense as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
